headline: KKR-Owned PR Firm Hires McKinsey to Advise on Growth Strategy
summary: (Bloomberg) -- FGS Global, which grew into one of the world’s biggest corporate communications firms through a series of mergers, has hired management consultancy McKinsey & Co. to advise on its growth strategy as KKR & Co. nears completion of its takeover.Most Read from BloombergThe Leaf Blowers Will Not Go QuietlyArizona Elections Signal Robust Immigration Enforcement Under TrumpScoring an Architectural Breakthrough in Denver’s RiNo DistrictKey Ballot Initiatives and Local Races Highlight View

headline: KKR price target raised to $159 from $158 at Deutsche Bank
summary: Deutsche Bank analyst Brian Bedell raised the firm’s price target on KKR (KKR) to $159 from $158 and keeps a Buy rating on the shares. Following the U.S. elections, the firm made several updates to its macro assumptions in its brokers, asset managers and exchanges models. Deutsche views the macro backdrop into at least 2025 as potentially fostering greater capital markets activity, with at least average positive equity market returns, supported by fiscal stimulus and potentially lighter regulati

headline: Greenhaven Road Capital Q3 2024 Investor Letter
summary: Greenhaven Road Capital Fund returned approximately +15% net during the third quarter, bringing year-to-date returns to approximately +12% net. Read more here.

headline: Rubber Meets Road For Divergent Buyout Shop Models
summary: Third-quarter results from Apollo Global Management, Blackstone, Carlyle and KKR reveal their approaches are paying off in different ways.
